Class MarkerManager

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class MarkerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Control Class to manage markers

      • setupMarker

        public void setupMarker(com.google.maps.android.kml.KmlLayer kmlLayer,
                        LocationManager locationManager,
                        java.lang.String category,
                        com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap mMap,
                        int value)
        Retrieves list of all coordinates from KMLLayer
        Parameters:
        kmlLayer - KMLLayer to extract coordinates from
        locationManager - locationManager to retrieve list of locations from
        category - determines which category of location the marker is representing
        mMap - Map to display markers on
        value - Sets default filter for map
